CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Annual Leave'),'Annual Leave '& '' & TEXT(Year__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Sick Leave'),'Sick Leave '&'' & TEXT(Year__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Maternity Leave'),'Maternity Leave '&''& TEXT(Year__c), IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Paternity Leave'),'Paternity Leave ' & '' & TEXT(Year__c),IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Exam Leave'),'Exam Leave '& '' & TEXT(Year__c),IF(ISPICKVAL(Leave_Type__c, 'Compassionate Leave'),'Compassionate Leave ' &''& TEXT(Year__c), null ) ) ))) )
CustomField.label: Leave Name
